title: Version 124.0.2478.80: May 2, 2024
text:
Version 124.0.2478.80: May 2, 2024 
Version 124.0.2478.80: May 2, 2024 
Fixed various bugs and performance issues. 
Stable channel security updates are listed  
here 
. 
Feature updates 
Sidebar Tools App - SpeedTest. 
 Adding a SpeedTest answer by default to the Tools app in the Microsoft Edge sidebar. For more information, see  
Manage the sidebar in Microsoft Edge 
.
